item.title: Birds
item.description: My passion for birds began in high school during a bird banding field class that also first spurred my curiosity in science. As a physics major in college, I continued to bird as often as I could and took an ornithology course in my final year. Starting grad school in NYC I thought I’d have to give up “real” birding, but it turns out — like with many things — NYC is an incredible place for birdwatching.
